Mode.description: multistereoscopic with ZoomF=8, ie. low preset 1pt/64px (other Values: Statue, Forest, TestIGN, MicMac, BigMac

RegExp.description: Regular Expression referring to the images to process

Orientation.description: is the orientation directory of the images to use to compute the point cloud (last orientation directory computed, step Center Bascule or Campari).

Output.description: is the name of the output ply file (C3DC_[Mode].ply by default).

Timeout.description: integer; expressed in seconds. Avoid to wait undefined time after c3dc command execution
